author: Iris Wright

review: I purchased this during the sale for Prime members of $19. I wasn't quite familiar with the fire TV and or stick but I'm happy that I purchased this. It has allowed me to give up cable and has offered more channels than cable. I've had a roku for over 4 years and didn't use it as much but since buying the fire TV stick,  I use my fire TV stick daily. Now that I no longer have cable I watch a lot  Amazon Prime movies, Hulu and Netflix via the fire TV stick. this was a great buy especially for the price. The only reason for 4 stars is you still have to use the power USB/AC cord. I was under the impression that it didn't need it, but I'm still happy otherwise
